Stony Brook University is known for its success in recruiting and educating underrepresented minority undergraduate students PERIOD However the increasing diversity in the student body is not mirrored by the faculty PERIOD

Three former Seawolves football players  safety Augie Contressa defensive tackle Sam Kamara and defensive back TJ Morrison  signed contracts with NFL teams as undrafted free agents PERIOD

OPINION After the disaster that was the first presidential debate the debate between vice presidential candidates followed the agreed debate format and covered issues including COVID19 racial justice and healthcare PERIOD

Stony Brooks season opener at MAC member Western Michigan is set to pay out  to the Seawolves PERIOD This means Stony Brook is currently slated to receive a combined total of  for showing up to play the first two weeks of its season against FBS opponents PERIOD

The mens basketball game against the Maine Black Bears on Saturday Feb PERIOD  marked the start of a historic achievement for Stony Brook Athletics  the first game to be streamed in Mandarin PERIOD

A showdown between rivals Stony Brook   and Binghamton   displayed a pair of teams with the two best overall records in the America East PERIOD The matchup did not disappoint as neither team separated by more than  points during the entire contest PERIOD

Stony Brook Footballs  season began Saturday afternoon with the Seawolves taking top25 FBS team to the edge losing  to USF on the road in a game that the Seawolves led at the half PERIOD

There is no doubt that plastics are appropriate for some products but onetimeuse plastics are usually wasteful and unnecessary PERIOD

Stony Brook mens basketball schedule was finally released this past Friday after the preseason National Invitation Tournament details were finalized after a long delay PERIOD
